entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Accessibility Object Issue #34791

Closed

  • Documentation updation ILogger interface #34800

PullRequests

Created

  • Make illink error less specific #34806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34789
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34788
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2249078 #34799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2248433 #34778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34734
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
